item.title: Here’s How Meme Stocks Performed Amid The Broader Market Sell-Off
item.description: On Thursday, the Dow Jones Industrial Average index plummeted by approximately 800 points, marking the index's worst performance since October 10.

item.title: Gauzy Stock Fell To An All-Time Low Today – Retail Decides To Go Contrarian

item.title: Why Is JD.Com Stock Falling Today?
item.description: Multiple brokerages lowered their price targets on the stock, flagging tougher comparisons for the fourth quarter.
